mathematica: veryprimeQ[n_] := (p = 2; r = True; While[p <= Sqrt[n], If[Abs[2*Mod[n, p] - p] > p/2, r = False; Break[]]; p = NextPrime[p]]; r); Select[ Prime[ Range[10000]], veryprimeQ](* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Nov 30 2011 *)
prog: (Haskell)a050264 n = a050264_list !! (n-1)a050264_list = filter chi [2..] where   chi n = f a000040_list where      f (p:ps) | p*p > n   = True               | otherwise = 2 * abs (2 * (n `mod` p) - p) <= p && f ps-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 11 2011
